website_summaries.verdict: It will not last forever, but is a good option while it lasts and is our Best Bang for Your Buck.
pros: This one is beauty with function: vividly colored shells in a visually appealing package that offers a soft, melodious sound in the slightest of breezes
cons: It may suffer in heavy winds and the shells may fade and fall away

customer_reviews.title: Gentle light weight chime
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile and light weight so it really flows with the breeze. Quiet gentle chime sound. I love mine and will get other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S

customer_reviews.title: Even more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. It was packaged perfectly and easy to unwrap without the strands getting tangled. It makes the most beautiful sound when the wind blows. The colors are more beautiful in person than in the photo online. VERY happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MamaDyno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy but delightfully so. Does fade in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: im bumbed because it is so pretty love the sound
customer_reviews.text: i had it hanging outside only a day or two and three plastic pieces snapped off, i live in florida so its not that windy here, im bumbed because it is so pretty love the sound, but three broke and have chips taken off them. i went by all the ratings it had, im a very good customer of amazon, they told me to send it back i threw away the box it came in so i had to use a bigger box first time i have ever had a problem been a customer since 2012.
customer_reviews.author: SweetiePie

customer_reviews.title: very pretty but NOT durable
customer_reviews.text: As others have said - shipped well so no tangles (huge plus!), great colors, soft sound BIGGEST CON- be warned - this is not an outdoor item. The wood is stained but will not hold up in the weather. It is strung together but a single thin string that will not hold up in any kind of weather. If it is outside, you will be lucky to get one whole season out of it. Best place is a sunny window in the house or protected porch
customer_reviews.author: George & Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful windchimes! I love them
customer_reviews.text: this came very well wrapped and is absolutely beautiful and the sound so melodic and you can not beat the price I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: When we decided to buy a wind chime, we first looked at a local score and boy---were they costly! But thank god for creating Amazon! We searched on Amazon for wind chimes that are cheap (less than 20$) yet received good reviews. This one seemed to be fit the bill. We ordered it and were not disappointed. This is medium long and was easy to hang. We love the colors so far. It takes only a light breeze for it to make a sound. The sound, though not very melodious, is fine to us and unique so far as wind chimes are concerned. Has not got tangled so far. What else could we expect? Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: ssray

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: This arrived packaged very well. I didn't use it until a couple days ago, because I saved it for my new apartment. This morning I look out and there are pieces all over the grass. This wind chime cannot handle any type of wind. There was no storm or anything, just normal wind and it fell apart and also, the rest was tangled. Very disappointed because it's so pretty. If you live anywhere that the wind blows, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and light
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 a couple years ago for the pool lanai area. I had hung it in the middle of 2 other items. it finally occurred to me to order 2 more because the colors are so nice. They are light enough in weight that when a breeze comes thru the pools screen the chimes actually move! They won't last forever but they are nice! 20200801 great breeze and you can hear and see what i am talking about in the video!
customer_reviews.author: Fingerstyler

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty and kind of glistens when the sun hits it
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was a little longer. It is pretty and kind of glistens when the sun hits it. The sound is pleasant. Not too high pitch but not hollow either. The rainbow colors are nice. Most wind chimes with any kind of color are solar and I've had enough of everything being solar. I have these hanging on my porch and even though the sound is pleasant, it is nice that I can enjoy them when I am outside and not have to listen to them from every room of my house because they are not extremely loud.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected!!! ^.^
customer_reviews.text: The item ship fast, well package, the colors are vivid and beautiful. It's such a beautiful piece, Thanks! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alma Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Not for our area
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a month, we had some very windy days, almost the whole thing broke to pieces and it's already faded as well. If you don't live in a very sunny area or have high winds, itay be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Young

customer_reviews.title: Good if you keep it out of the elements
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty, but it does not hold up to the elements at all. It was in a partially covered area for less than 6 months and it looks terrible now. The paint has faded and the wood has faded and warped. Indoors or on a fully covered porch would be fine. I purchased it for $15.99 and it was definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors, nice sound
customer_reviews.text: This wind chime is a great value. The box it came in didn't do it any justice. You may want to "re box" if giving as a gift but it is certainly gift able. The chimes are colorful and the "tinkling" sound emitted is pleasing. I think it's made well as far as chimes go..am looking forward to enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn C. Roll

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful windchime
customer_reviews.text: This windchime is absolutely gorgeous! Bright colors and sounds so pretty. I really appreciate the packaging as well, came with all the sections wrapped individually so I didn't have to untangle a thing. This would make a perfect gift or a little treat for yourself : )
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: when your husbands loves them too
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and the sound is just as I remember - seashells blowing in the wind. They were mailed out promptly and securely. Really love the vibrant colors tooo! I will say that I purchased this item on 7-24 for $10.28.... why now $14???? not sure why photo is rotated..... sorry tried to rotate :(
customer_reviews.author: aimeesavage

customer_reviews.title: Great chimes - Color Fades
customer_reviews.text: These windchimes are great but as stated in previous reviews, the vibrant pretty color fades within a few months... I hung my set under my patio and use it as a type of chandelier (full shade) and it still faded. The sound is tinkly and dainty... I love them other than the cheaper color stain.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beauty in the colors.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful the wind chime came package so well each strands are bagged that when you open them the shells come out with no tangles. When you hang it up it is so amazing . The colors are so perfect, I’m sold , I will definitely buy from them again. I placed it where it doesn’t get to much wind, it should last longer where it’s at. I can see it while I’m in door too!
customer_reviews.author: nyjints86

customer_reviews.title: easy to remove from packaging (packaged well with no damage ...
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful, easy to remove from packaging (packaged well with no damage from shipping). I hung these wind chimes from my covered front porch and they are very pretty and make a nice, light sound when the wind blows them (not too clunky or loud like some metal wind chimes that would annoy your neighbors or wake you up if your bedroom windows are open).
customer_reviews.author: jbiels

customer_reviews.title: A real delight!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wind chime! Our new house has a dull colored front, and since I love wind chimes, I bought this hoping it would add some color and provide a lovely sound, although I was worried that the shells might break in heavy winds. Chime has been dropped a couple times (during hanging hook replacement) and we've had a few high gusting storms and the chime is still in fine shape, no cracks or discoloration! Lovely sound. Couldn't be happier with my purchase. =)
customer_reviews.author: Anora SS

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: It makes a dainty, light chiming noise when the wind blows, not or obnoxious. Very pretty to look at. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: nikkitikkitavii

customer_reviews.title: Color washes off in just a few weeks...
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful when I got it, delivered June 6 2018. It is now June 23rd and the colors are almost completely gone... and I checked, yes it is advertised as an outdoor decoration. Definitely won’t buy again. So now I’m left with what do I do with it now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Colorful and sounds great!  Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful!!!! The chimes are very light and chime together beautifully!!! The colorful look is gorgeous. I'm considering buying a second one!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Colors faded but still holding up
customer_reviews.text: Like the sounds but as I expected, the colors have faded very quickly. 11/13/18 Update - still holding up and has not fallen apart even with some strong winds. If I buy these again, I am going to spray spar varnish on the whole thing and maybe the colors won’t fade so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: coralee seifert

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, pleasant to hear
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new one every spring because I really like it. It would be perfect if it could go all year without fading and some of the shells breaking off but you have to expect something like this to be a little delicate. We get strong winds and sun where I live so I don't expect that it would last forever. In the spring I can sit on my porch swing and enjoy the sounds it makes. Then when the spring winds die down I replace it with the new one for the year. It is bright and cheery to look at and very pleasant to hear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Really faded from sun
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this very long and it only got morning sun and it is fading really bad already.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the colors are beautiful and the stones are well made
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves these, the colors are beautiful and the stones are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Wind Chime??
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful but it definitely is not an outdoor whine chime. I never knew some wind chimes were better left inside. It has been outside for a little over a month now and it has lost numerous pieces. It is a beautiful wind chime and so eye catching with all its colors but it will not even last one summer.
customer_reviews.author: ND Pegarsch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of chimes, just like I remember them. Haven't seen these in a while, since moving from Florida. They are well made, with Capiz shells, and fishing string of course, and makes a most graceful sound when a breeze moves them. I'm already getting compliments on them. Will probably be getting more. They are nicely packed with plastic slips over on the chimes.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyH

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the appearance of this windchime! However, I did buy it because I thought it would make a very soft sound, but in fact, the sound is very loud and kind of sort of startles me a bit when I hear it, so I decided to hang it inside my house instead of outside. So, if you don't mind the loud glass clanky sound, you will enjoy it outside your home. But even inside my home, it looks SO cute and when the AC gently blows around it, it doesn't make as loud of a sound as compared to being outside with the rough winds,
customer_reviews.author: I'm just a girl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and gentle sound!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged incredibly well! Ordered the multicolored one for my elderly Mom's patio and the turquoise/aqua one for myself to hang next to my ocean themed mantle. Love the gentle sound when the window is open. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Spokane WA

customer_reviews.title: Stunning but not weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: It sounds beautiful - my favorite sound ever from chimes - and at first looks lovely but after a few rainy weeks the colors faded and since it is basically held together with fishing line, that snapped and a few of the strands are shorter now. Easy to repair but wish I didn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a pleasure to watch and listen to.
customer_reviews.text: The wind chime is a pleasure to watch and listen to in the backyard. It is colorful , it is well made and is the second one in my yard that is still going strong !
customer_reviews.author: jiiveshi

customer_reviews.title: It is so pretty and sounds great too
customer_reviews.text: Edit: chimes have been up all summer, and still look great. The spot is pretty shady. Maybe that's the key to keeping it from fading. I'm buying a back up because I love it so much! It is so pretty and sounds great too. If it ends up fading ( as previously mentioned in other reviews) I still won't be sorry I bought it. I spend $10 on annual plants that I know are just temporary color bursts for the summer season. I might buy another one to have it for next summer
customer_reviews.author: Nick Szwed

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in 2 days due to Prime membership. Very colorful with pretty sound. Tends to tangle in strong wind. This items is MUCH larger than seller describes. I measured the capiz chime part at 21" and the top with hanging string about 7" so FYI mine is about 28" tall and 4" around. I placed it and another capiz chime in a large bay window facing west. Great color play when the sun hits it -- hope it does not fade. Maybe a polymer coat on it could help.
customer_reviews.author: MarkB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved color but continues to fall apart. Just picked up a handful of broken off parts. Haven’t even had a strong wind which you might expect to cause it breaking
customer_reviews.author: Linda Boyd

customer_reviews.title: in some pretty stiff winds and it has held up great
customer_reviews.text: When I first unboxed it I was worried that it would be too fragile. It's been up in our yard for several months now, in some pretty stiff winds and it has held up great. The sound is calming and the way the light catches the pieces looks cool too. Edit: after about a year I've noticed that some tiles have fallen off and most have faded in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: ZenBob

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. Faded and fell apart within a week. Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the vibrant colors, and the relaxing wind songs it makes!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and mesmerizing. I ordered one for myself and one as a gift. I hung it inside my front widow from the curtain rod because of apartment rules, and if I crack open my window, the wind blows in just enough to make it come alive at night time, or with the fan blowing. Otherwise, I have the window open during the daytime and so I can enjoy watching it and listening to it almost any time.
customer_reviews.author: Paradisesb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but falls apart in the Wind
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty wind chimes to look at, provided there is no wind. Every slight wind ..the more pieces fall off. I bought a few and they all have 6 pieces dangling. And now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: mina tomaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.. attractive Chime !
customer_reviews.text: As seen, comes nicely and safely packaged ! They are nice colours, easy to assemble and a good price ! The shells / collided squares can break and chip if not careful ! I found it worked for me and a great buy !
customer_reviews.author: Myra MLH

customer_reviews.title: colorful and happy, I was not expecting a lot of sound
customer_reviews.text: awesomeness , colorful and happy , I was not expecting a lot of sound, it is plastic ...but they do make a clicky clackey sound that it is pleasant !
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It’s really pretty, but I don’t think it will last. The ‘chime’ is more of a broken glass clanging sound. It will not withstand the wind & is too fragile.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: and the sound is really fun. A unique sound for a set of chimes
customer_reviews.text: This set of chimes is incredible durable. The wind blows constantly in my backyard (wind tunnel effect), so these chimes have had quite a beating, but nothing has broken, and the sound is really fun. A unique sound for a set of chimes.
customer_reviews.author: AC302

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wind Chime
customer_reviews.text: This is such a gorgeous wind chime. The colors are stunning, and the sound is lovely. Unfortunately mine arrived broken. I was upset to sa the least, but luckily they have really good customer service team and I appreciate the solution they provided.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tingling sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I love the sound. I'm going to get another one (or two). The sound is awesome. I'm using for indoor use, however, I experimented and found that using a sharpie easily re-colors the shells so if they fade as some outside users say they have. No biggie. Simply recolor!
customer_reviews.author: M. V. Kolar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sounding!
customer_reviews.text: We love these wind chimes so much - they are our favorites out of the 5 that we own. Ours have gotten faded over the last 2 years, but they still sound beautiful. We just ordered another set for the back yard. I'm going to try and paint the one I have now. Great value and the sound is so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Can take a beating!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Tampa Bay area and I can tell you this chime takes a wind beating from time to time. Still in perfect condition, well packed no tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and soothing
customer_reviews.text: very beautiful, colorful wind chime, with very pleasant , warm, soothing "costal" sound. Should compliment any window or a deck. I bought it for my backyard deck, where we have lots of shades, and the whole dynamic of the place has changed with this wind chime
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Unique and not cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: This windchime is really quite nice and for the price I paid for it, a super deal. I initially put it outside, but decided I wanted it in my craft room instead. Some mentioned that it faded in direct sunlight, so I thought it would be better indoors but where it made a delightful sound when a breeze traveled through the room. I love it so much I ordered one sent to my sil and my daughter. They were thrilled too..
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, the picture doesn't do them justice.
customer_reviews.text: These are so lovely... their "song" is beautiful, and they are so lovely to look at. Just be sure to hang them in a sheltered place, not right out in the direct wind and weather. We have a big screened-in porch, and they are Perfect out there! LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rainbow of Color
customer_reviews.text: It's not just a wind chime, it has stunning vibrant colored chimes that make a soft yet beautiful sound. The quality is really good on this wind chime with a solid thick wooden top and thick line that holds each colorful chime piece. I was pleasantly surprised at how pretty it really is. It is a great addition to my front porch and the hummingbirds are attracted to it too. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Suderow

customer_reviews.title: Careful!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box for this, I found that one of the tendrils had gotten caught in the packaging, and snapped off with the opening of the box. As it was supposed to be a present, I looked to see if I could exchange it... and the shipper's policies said I couldn't. I ended up buying my own fishing line at the store and fixing it myself. It's very pretty, and surprisingly loud for shells, but VERY FRAGILE. I don't know how long it'll hold up. Definitely not something to put up outside in an open area.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Entire family enjoyed looking at it and couldn't believe "young or that on Amazon?". Reviews I read were correct when said good quality. Each length of 'discs' were attached but wrapped and sealed individually in clear plastic so they wouldn't tangle. I wasn't sure what sound it would make, besides clanging noise but actually makes beautiful music wind chime sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: I had been purchasing my shell chimes from a local store but they closed. When I saw these I got very excited as they were comparably priced and my old ones had faded and needed to be replaced. I love the unique sound and lively colors. Everyone who came over noticed that I had replaced the older ones. I always recommend Amazon to all my friends as I am usually extremely satisfied with what I order and the prices.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice wind chime...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed when first unpackaging that product didn't seem more substantial... I fault myself for this for not checking out the reviews. Was expecting glass... reminds me more of thin seashell type material (plastic?). In actual use it has a nice klinking sound... not overbearing. Sun does tend to wash out the color over time... recommend keeping it in shade unless faded colors don't bother you.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN LUTZ

customer_reviews.title: The colors are very pretty, I do feel it could get broken if ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the outside of our house . We put this in our gazebo because I did not want it to get ruined. The gazebo protects it from the sun and heavy winds. The colors are very pretty, I do feel it could get broken if there was a lot of wind. I just really wanted it to look nice for the baby and I to look at. It does not make a "typical" wind chime sound but I am ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Henkelman

customer_reviews.title: The person I gave this gift to is all smiles.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a friend who has a collection of indoor chimes, and he loves it. He's older and mostly homebound and he appreciates color all around him. We aren't concerned about how it'll hold up in strong winds, because he has hung it indoors, over an air vent, where it has movement and sound. He can see it and hear it and it won't get damanged. I'll buy these in the future to give as gifts for people with patios or sheltered spaces that can use beautifying. I have a particular little girl in mind to receive these chimes soon.
customer_reviews.author: Janie A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love! So beautiful and well made. The chimes kind of sound like a creepy carnival to my friends and I, but we like it :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, colorful wind chime !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I love all the colors and like the sound of the shells in the breeze. It did not disappoint. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: DHD

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wind chime. It's a beautiful design, and it sounds so peaceful when the wind is blowing. It's light enough so that the wind can blow it around easier than other wind chimes, which I love. The whole purpose of having them is to hear them! It's a nice sound, light wind chime, and beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: Caleigh

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I just love love love these wind chimes! They sound great and are made pretty sturdy. I will probably buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: JDMess

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these wind chimes!!! The colors are so pretty and the sound is lovely.I love wind chimes and have big ones on my front porch that have a BIG sound and these are on the back patio area and the sound is very delicate and being lightweight they catch the wind so easily...I just love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yorkiemom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, decent size
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wind chime hanging inside my screened in porch for several months now. I have not experienced any discoloration or broken pieces on the chime as some other reviews have reported, but I suspect this is because hanging in a semi-covered area, mine is less exposed to the elements than others. Beautiful colors, decent size, nice sound. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara in St. Louis

customer_reviews.title: So colorful in the yard!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and love the way they sound. Very light with the breeze. Nice Quality and wrapped safely so arrived in perfect condition...I took them apart carefully though so as not to damage string or shells.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors and it came in well packed. I bought it for hanging indoor from the ceiling and it gives out very subtle chimes when AC kicks on. I am buying another one my bedroom as well! Don't hesitate to get this. You'll get exactly this cute, colorful & well made chimes just like the pictures. There is absolutely nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.author: RubyGA

customer_reviews.title: These are just beautiful! Love the pretty tinkling sound they make and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are just beautiful! Love the pretty tinkling sound they make and they do NOT tangle at all. Left them up yesterday with pretty strong wind and today again with no issues at all. Great purchase and perfect packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: beckie

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago but just put outside this season and it is already totally faded out.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but unfortunately they broke so I can’t do anything with them
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cute but troublesom wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the most aggravating wind chime I have ever had. Just the slightest wind and they all get tangled up and are very hard to separate. Also within a few weeks they have all faded, and they are mounted on the covered back porch where they do no get in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: OKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Winchime!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Winchime! Beautiful colors and sound nice even with the slightest breeze, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: High quality glass shells. Very pretty and makes a nostalgic sound as it blows in the wind. I purchased this for my Mom for Mother's Day and she couldn't be happier. Simple beauty. It comes packaged with great care as all of the hanging parts are secured in plastic envelopes to prevent them from tangling. Absolutely love this chime! The colors are vibrant and textured. Very satisfied with this purchase! In fact, I have already ordered another one, the Blue Handworks Santa Fe Wind Chime. Hope I love it as much as this one!
customer_reviews.author: Janeen A.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this wind chime to anyone
customer_reviews.text: this wind chime is even more lovely than the picture - the colors are absolutely gorgeous ! the first day we had it hanging from a tree outside our lanai in Florida, we had some very strong winds......after a few hours it did break loose from the fishing line which is was hanging from. picked it up from the ground and it was all in tact.....survived the winds and the fall. I would recommend this wind chime to anyone......and such a fabulous price - will be buying more for our home back in Wisconsin :-)
customer_reviews.author: Wiscjc

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty! The sound is nice and the colors are eye catching. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sounds, beautiful colors. Buy one for yourself& gift another
customer_reviews.author: GnLSoul

customer_reviews.title: Really wonderful Gift
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to git these chimes. I orderd one for myself as well as one for a gift. These arer packed really well and when I do get to undo the package of each strand they will be beautiful in the sunlight as well sweet soundinig to the ear. I bought the last two on Amazon, so glad I did. If you can find them again on there, best you get them while you can if they carry them again. I wanted to buy 6 but I could only get the last 2. Should Amazon have them again I'll be getting many more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Iingraham

customer_reviews.title: No Way
customer_reviews.text: This chime did not last but a few months before chimes start falling off and string start breaking. It is NOT durable.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Decent chime
customer_reviews.text: Cute little wind chime. Not sure what it is made of, but would suspect some kind of resin. Makes less noise than tube chimes which is what we wanted. The little pieces are about the size of a silver dollar and about the thickness of a thin tortilla chip. All in all pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: edmocon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this colorful chime. They both hang on my covered deck so they aren't totally open to the weather. Have had the first one over a year now. It's faded a bit but still is pretty. Hasn't broken. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Babycakes

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and colorful and came safely packed. Looks same as photo.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Nice chime
customer_reviews.text: This Urban Trends Capiz Wind Chime is attractive. The workmanship is great and it is colorful. Mine is indoors as I suspect this wouldn't hold up long in a major windy situation. If I had a patio with an out of the way corner, maybe. Anyway, this chime adds discrete color to my indoor garden. Happy it found a good home!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyAboutBooks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wind chime
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wind chime. It is brilliantly colored like the picture and each strand comes individually wrapped which made it super easy to unpack. It has a nice tone when the wind blows.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect them to last outside
customer_reviews.text: SUPER cute but lasted one month outside. I’ll give them a month and a half. Purchased late May, it is mid July. They’re ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Urban Trands Capiz Multi colored shell Wind Chimes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning.. I've gotten so many compliments. The colors are bright and cheerful. I don't know how long it'll hold up but I'd buy it again and again. The sound it makes takes some getting use to but it's worth it. ****UPDATE**** They've been hanging on my porch in the Las Vegas sun, heat and wind. We've had a couple of windy and stormy days. Sustained winds of 35 plus MPH... They're fine!
customer_reviews.author: LeinlvTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Moderate volume chimes
customer_reviews.text: Not too loud but louder than another capiz chime I bought. The other chime was much more fragile though so the durability is worth the increase in volume. The colors have faded which for me was nice. My baby loves to watch these chimes.
customer_reviews.author: verbatimshanks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but-
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful but don’t leave out in the elements. Fades quickly-
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME - I have it hanging in my breakfast room ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME - I have it hanging in my breakfast room by a sunny window. Love the way the light plays off the colorful discs. I have my ceiling fan on all the time and it just lightly tinkles. I didn't hang it outside because I was afraid it would get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of capiz wind chimes. This was very reasonably priced and had a lot of nicely coloured shells. More than I expected. Very pleased with this item and it compares favourably with the ones I've paid more for.
customer_reviews.author: Folantin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, cute and colorful Wind Chime makes a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, cute and colorful Wind Chime makes a nice gentle sound when a little breeze sails through it... great for indoors near a window... A beautiful reminder of a springy day in the middle of the winter. I would even put it on top of a baby crib... I think. Lovely ;))
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Let's start this out by saying I use these indoors so I can't comment on how these hold up to real wind or rain. These are so bright and colorful! They have a soft tinkling sound, like thin shells clanking. These are lightweight enough that me heat/AC on is enough for a slight tinkling sound. Turn on a fan and its a a bit more sound. So pretty! Fantastic set of chimes for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hugginkiss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Decor Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I wanted color outside my house and I love the sound of wind chimes. When I found these, I thought they were exactly what I was looking for and I was right! I have had them hanging outside in the Florida sun, wind, and rain for about 3 months now and they have held up great! The color is still vibrant and none of the "shells" have broken (and they swing around A LOT)! I love these wind chimes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They have a delightful sound and when the sun hits it, it sparkles like jewels. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: I use this as my daughter's mobile above her crib ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my daughter's mobile above her crib. She loves it and I get lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: police

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and colorful.
customer_reviews.text: A nice, colorful and priced right chime. Perfect condition when arrived. After about a month one of the filament lines broke, but I expected that and was easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Ute

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I am still looking for a place to hang them in my back yard. Can’t hang them out front because some one will steal them.
customer_reviews.author: Mick4loo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I now have these wind chimes over my kitchen sink in front of the window. I did have them outside but they clanked instead of cited and I'm sure that my neighbors didn't appreciate the sound they made. They do look good where they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer lmotta

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Well packaged. Beautifully made. Wonderful to look at. The perfect soft sounds emanate with the slightest breeze. Made a great Mother's Day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this wind chime
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these, totally in love with them. Beautiful sound and beautiful shell! I have had these about 4 months and mine have held up wonderful. I love the fact these are made on plastic cord that will hold up a lot longer than other chimes made with the stretchy stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Chimes you must see to believe!!
customer_reviews.text: I am THRILLED with my new Urban Trend Capiz Wind Chimes! It is even more beautiful than the picture and the tinkling sounds it makes are lovely! I have it hanging in my family room so I could enjoy it more!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Engel

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Great bright colors and perfect size and looks great on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: La2009

product_meta.description: bombayjewel's wind chime great for the garden and patio. Exhibits special passion for coastal decoration. It is multi color, beautiful touch of décor. A class apart home decoration. Designed for elite class decor enthusiasts. Beautiful wind chime for patio and garden, it is made of fine Indonesian capiz to enhance outdoor decors.
